name: Underground (itch) (Ludzik)
description:
Story

Explore the undergrounds and find your old friends. The are hiding from him. Don't let him find them first.

Note

For best experience play with headphones on, loud, in a dark room.

Settings

Movement - WASD

Looking around - Mouse

Crouch - Ctrl

The only setting that can be adjusted is the sensitivity located in the pause menu.

Developer Note

It shouldn't take more than 10 minutes to finish game.  Game made in 2 days after long break.
